examples.text: Hadi 2,000 liraya da eyvallah, ama 2,500 lira nedir?
examples.translation: Okay, I can still agree to 2,000 lira, but 2,500 lira? Come on!

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish ایوالله (eyvallah), from Arabic اي or ايا + والله (wal-lāhi). The noun is from eyvallah demek (“to accept, to agree to”, literally “to say eyvallah”).
